title: so cary and so good
review: I was very impressed with this film. I did not know it was this scary and this great. I highly recommend to watch it. The main lady should have gotten at least nominated for her performance. Brilliant work.

title: Not a fan
review: I am not a fan of these type of stories but this one kid of touch me. The acting is impeccable and I loved the directing too. Very well done film.

title: the most well done movie ever
review: I think you prolly get it from my title that i love this movie. it is by far my favorite movie ever. i have seen this movie at least 50 times and i will watch it so many more.
